source.name: LIG4base: Mutation registry for LIG4 syndrome

transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_002312.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000356922.5. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 90 (GRCh38 primary assembly)
